Agile Projects with Tosca Testsuite
If there’s one thing that all agile teams have in common, it is to deliver a potentially releasable product with each sprint. The only way to do this in a reasonable amount of time is by guaranteeing a high degree of automation. Tosca is the perfect tool for this as it allows agile team members to share the functional tests with ease.
Read more: http://www.tricentis.com/sites/default/files/newsletter/2014/January/newsletter.html#featured

Windows: Out with the Old, in with the New
Windows has announced it will stop supporting Windows XP and Office 2003 starting on April 8, 2014. For this reason, Tosca will no longer support Windows XP starting with our version 8.2.0 planned for April 2014. Feel free to contact the Tricentis Support team in case you have any questions.
Read more: http://www.tricentis.com/sites/default/files/newsletter/2014/January/newsletter.html#windows Tricentis Support team: https://support.tricentis.com/en/contact
